data: Laura Garcia is an independent consultant specializing in digital transformation and IT strategy with over ten years of experience.
Laura Garcia has provided consulting services to Fortune 500 clients focusing on streamlining operations and modernizing technology stacks.
Laura Garcia is located in Austin, Texas, in the United States.
Laura Garcia's expertise includes cloud migration, process automation, and change management.
Laura Garcia possesses skills in cloud architecture, agile methodologies, and stakeholder management.
Laura Garcia has consulted on over twenty digital transformation projects.
Laura Garcia has achieved reductions in operational costs by up to thirty percent for key clients.
